00251 
00252 #include <sys/version.h>
00253 
00254 #define OS_VERSION_NUMBER  0x04080300UL
00255 static CONST char os_version_string[] = "4.8.3.0";
00256 
00261 
00262 
00271 uint32_t NutVersion(void)
00272 {
00273     return OS_VERSION_NUMBER;
00274 }
00275 
00287 CONST char *NutVersionString(void)
00288 {
00289     return os_version_string;
00290 }
